subject: Speedskating
Doping (Sports)
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The Russian speedskating champion Sergei Lisin is facing a two-year doping ban after failing a test for the blood booster EPO, Russia’s governing body for the sport said.
snippet: The Russian speedskating champion Sergei Lisin is facing a two-year doping ban after failing a test for the blood booster EPO, Russia’s governing body for the sport said.
